1.log_text: a series of flooded caves leading to a grotto.
examine_text: You examine the pool of slime and upon closer inspection you find that it leads to a cave system flooded by slime leading in an <d>unknown</d> direction.
You could possibly dive in and swim towards the end?
On closer inspection the glinting object is revealed to be a key.
It looks very old and seems to be made of iron. It has some slime on it.

3.log_text: a tight cave leading out of the grotto.
examine_text: You examine the cave entrance, it looks big enough for you to fit inside.
